description:
As an event administrator
  I want to manage events and monitor registrations in real-time
  So that I can ensure smooth event operations

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
the dashboard is displaying current metrics:
a new registration is completed for "2" tickets at "$75" each
within "2" seconds the dashboard should update to show:
the recent registrations list should show the new attendee at the top
a notification should appear "New registration received!"
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
the event has a capacity of "500" attendees
"498" tickets have been sold
I view the capacity warning
I should see "ALMOST SOLD OUT - Only 2 tickets remaining!"
I click "Manage Capacity"
I can:
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
there are "200" registered attendees
"50" have dietary restrictions
I create a new email campaign
I select the segment "Attendees with dietary restrictions"
"50" recipients should be selected
I use the template "Dietary Information Update"
I customize the content:
I click "Send Campaign"
the campaign should be queued for delivery
I should see real-time delivery metrics:
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
the event has the following registration data:
I generate a financial report for "March 2025"
the report should show:
I should be able to export as "PDF" or "Excel"
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
today is the event date "2025-07-04"
the check-in mode is activated
an attendee presents QR code "FD-123456"
I scan it with the mobile app
the system should:
the check-in count should increment
the same QR code is scanned again
it should show "Already checked in at 10:30 AM"
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
I navigate to "Content Management"
I edit the "Founders Day 2025" event
I can update:
I update the event schedule
I click "Publish Changes"
the changes should appear on the public site immediately
a version history entry should be created
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
I navigate to the analytics dashboard
I should see visualizations for:
I can filter data by:
I am logged in as an admin with email "admin@foundersday.com"
I am on the admin dashboard
I have super admin privileges
I navigate to "Team Management"
I invite a new admin with email "volunteer@foundersday.com"
I can assign permissions:
they accept the invitation
they should only see allowed menu items
restricted actions should be hidden

name: Admin Event Management Dashboard

description:
As a Lodge Administrator
  I want to manage Founders Day events
  So that members can register and participate

elements.name: Create a new Founders Day event

steps.name: I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
I navigate to the event management dashboard
I click "Create New Event"
I fill in the event details:
I upload an event banner image
I click "Save and Publish"
I should see a success message "Event created successfully"
the event should appear in the events list with status "Published"
members should be able to see the event on the public calendar
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event "Spring Gathering" exists with 25 registrations
I edit the event details
I change the venue to "St. Paul Masonic Center"
I click "Save Changes"
I should see a warning "This event has existing registrations. Attendees will be notified of changes."
I confirm the changes
all 25 registered attendees should receive an email notification
the event history should show the venue change
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event exists with capacity 100
50 members are already registered
a member tries to register
they should be able to register
the available spots should show 49
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event exists with capacity 100
99 members are already registered
a member tries to register
they should be able to register
the available spots should show 0
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event exists with capacity 100
100 members are already registered
a member tries to register
they should see "Event is full" message
the available spots should show 0
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event exists with capacity 100
100 members are already registered
a member tries to register
they should be added to waitlist
the available spots should show 0
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event "Summer Picnic" exists with 45 registrations
I navigate to the event details page
I click "Cancel Event"
I should see a warning "This will cancel the event and notify all 45 registered attendees. This action cannot be undone."
I provide a cancellation reason "Venue unavailable due to renovations"
I confirm the cancellation
the event status should change to "Cancelled"
all registered attendees should receive a cancellation email with the reason
all payments should be marked for refund
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
an event "Annual Dinner" exists
I navigate to the event registrations page
I should see a list of all registered members

cells: See member info and guest count

steps.name: I should be able to:
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
multiple events have been completed
I navigate to the events analytics page
I should see:
I should be able to export reports as PDF or Excel
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
I am logged in as a "Lodge Secretary"
I navigate to the event management dashboard
I should only see events for my assigned lodge
I should be able to:
I am logged in as a lodge administrator
I have permission to manage events for "Minneapolis Lodge #19"
I create a new event
I enable "Make this a recurring event"
I set recurrence pattern:
I save the event
6 individual events should be created
each event should have the correct date:

name: Event Management

description:
As an event organizer
  I want to securely process payments through Square
  So that attendees can purchase tickets safely and efficiently

steps.name: Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
my cart contains:
I proceed to checkout
I should see the Square payment form embedded
I enter payment details:
I submit the payment
I should see "Processing payment..."
within "10" seconds I should see "Payment successful!"
a Square transaction should be created with:
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
my cart total is "$75.00"
I enter the test card number "4000 0000 0000 0002" (decline)
I submit the payment
I should see "Payment declined. Please try another card."
no order should be created in the database
the cart should remain intact
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
I inspect the payment form
the Square iframe should be loaded from "https://web.squarecdn.com"
the card number field should not be accessible from our JavaScript
the form should use SCA (Strong Customer Authentication) when required
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
there is a completed order "#FD-789012" for "$150.00"
I am logged in as an admin
I navigate to the order details
I click "Process Refund"
I select "Full Refund"
I provide the reason "Event cancelled"
I confirm the refund
a Square refund should be initiated for "$150.00"
the order status should change to "Refunded"
an email should be sent to the customer
the tickets should be released back to inventory
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
I have initiated a payment for "$75.00"
Square sends a payment.created webhook
our system should verify the webhook signature
update the order status to "Payment Confirmed"
send a confirmation email
if the signature is invalid
the webhook should be rejected with status "401"
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
my cart total is "$75.00"
I submit a valid payment
the network connection is interrupted
the system should retry the payment "3" times
show "Retrying payment..." to the user
the connection is restored
the payment should complete successfully
only one charge should appear in Square
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
my cart total is "$75.00"
I enter a European test card "4000 0027 6000 3184"
I submit the payment
I should be redirected to 3D Secure authentication
I complete the authentication successfully
I should return to the confirmation page
the payment should be completed
Square payment integration is configured
I have items in my registration cart
the following payments were processed today:
an admin generates the daily payment report
the report should show:
should match the Square dashboard totals

name: Payment Processing with Square

description:
As a Minnesota resident interested in attending Founders Day
  I want to register for the event online
  So that I can secure my spot and receive event information

name: Test Setup Verification

description:
As a Minnesota Freemason
  I want to register for Founders Day events
  So that I can participate in lodge activities

steps.name: I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I fill in the registration form with:
I accept the terms and conditions
I click the "Register" button
I should see a success message "Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account."
I should receive a verification email at "john.smith@example.com"
my account should be created with status "pending_verification"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
a user already exists with email "john.smith@example.com"
I navigate to the registration page
I fill in the registration form with:
I click the "Register" button
I should see an error message "An account with this email already exists"
the email field should be highlighted in red
I should remain on the registration page
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I enter "weak" in the password field

arguments.content:
Password must contain:
- At least 8 characters
- One uppercase letter
- One lowercase letter
- One number
- One special character

steps.name: I should see password requirements:
the password strength indicator should show "Weak"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I am using a mobile device
I navigate to the registration page
the form should be displayed in a single column
all form fields should be easily tappable
the keyboard should automatically appear for the first field
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I fill in the registration form with:
I click the "Register" button
I should see an error message "Member ID not found in lodge records"
the member ID field should be highlighted in red
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I have registered with email "john.smith@example.com"
I have received a verification email
I click the verification link in the email
I should be redirected to the login page
I should see a success message "Email verified successfully! You can now log in."
my account status should be updated to "active"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I enter "invalid-email" in the "Email" field
I move to the next field
I should see validation message "Please enter a valid email address"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I enter "123" in the "Phone" field
I move to the next field
I should see validation message "Please enter a valid phone number"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I enter "abc" in the "Lodge Number" field
I move to the next field
I should see validation message "Lodge number must be numeric"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I enter "" in the "First Name" field
I move to the next field
I should see validation message "First name is required"
I am on the Founders Day Minnesota website
I am not logged in
I navigate to the registration page
I enter "" in the "Last Name" field
I move to the next field
I should see validation message "Last name is required"

name: User Registration
